Author: BitcoinFuture99
Title: [ANN][ICO] Mijn Vastgoed Dutch real estate
Body: Real estate investments for everyone  Unfortunately, right now, real estate investments are not possible for everyone. Huge amounts of knowledge and money are a requisite in order to make a successful investment; in addition, the real estate market is a one-horse town industry where the most profitable properties are traded amongst each other, not to mention the unclear notary and financing costs. Crowdfunding based on blockchain has the potential to unleash a revolution in this industry.  What does Mijn Vastgoed™ strive to do?  Mijn Vastgoed is a dutch initiative, and only focus on the dutch market. We want to make it possible for everyone to invest in real estate. That is why Mijn Vastgoed is developing an online platform where individual investment properties can be divided into blockchain tokens and offered. Platform users are therefore entitled to a part of the rental income and the surplus value when the property is sold. The blockchain tokens can be purchased and traded on the online platform, enabling customers to purchase and sell their real estate investments at lightning speed.  Why is Mijn Vastgoed™ organising a token sale?  The financing for the development of the online platform is done through the issuance of dividend tokens. These dividend tokens entitle the owner to a dividend from the company. By acquiring funds this way, Mijn Vastgoed makes it possible for everyone to invest in the start-up. The dividend tokens must not be confused with the later blockchain tokens that make it possible to invest in an investment property on the online platform.  The ICO starts at the first of june  The whitepaper is already in English. The English website is coming soon.  Read the whitepaper: https://mijnvastgoed.nl/wp-content/uploads/english-mijnvastgoed-whitepaper.pdf  The website: https://mijnvastgoed.nl/  We are always looking for people who want to promote our ICO. In exchange we offer a generous amount of tokens https://mijnvastgoed.nl/bounty-program/  Watch the Mijn Vastgoed video https://youtu.be/2I9_kA_V25E           Join our community  Telegram: https://t.me/mijnvastgoed  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MijnVastgoed/  Twitter: https://twitter.com/MijnVastgoed  Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/MijnVastgoed/  Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/mijn-vastgoed/  Website: https://mijnvastgoed.nl/  Watch the Mijn Vastgoed video https://youtu.be/2I9_kA_V25E  Read the whitepaper https://mijnvastgoed.nl/wp-content/uploads/english-mijnvastgoed-whitepaper.pdf  We are always looking for people who want to promote our ICO. In exchange we offer a generous amount of tokens https://mijnvastgoed.nl/bounty-program/

Author: LoveCryptoAll
Title: [ANN][ICO] Mijn Vastgoed Dutch real estate
Body: You have it written. "Mijn Vastgoed is a Dutch initiative, and it focuses only on the Dutch market." We want everyone to invest in real estate. " I believe that it is right to focus on the specific market of a particular country. This indicates the seriousness of intentions.

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN][ICO] Mijn Vastgoed Dutch real estate
Body: The best European ICO of 2018? That could well be the title which Mijn Vastgoed™ may soon give itself. For Mijn Vastgoed™ has reached the top 10 in the European ICO Pitch Competition. At the 7th of June Mijn Vastgoed™ is in the final and battles for the title of the best European ICO of 2018. The pitch final takes place during the Blockchain Innovation Conference in the headquarters of the Rabobank in Utrecht.     European Pitch ICO Competition Projects could apply for participation in the European ICO Pitch Competition. A jury, led by renowned publicist and blockchain advisor Richard Kastelein judged the ICO's. Kastelein is founder of Blockchainnews.com and advises blockchain projects world wide. Kastelein also wrote publications about blockchain for Harvard Business Review.  The projects have been judged on concept, professionality and the team. A requirement for participation was that a project had to be European based. Other projects from the top 10 which also battle for the title are Time.Lab (medical), Fissacoin (events) and Icasting (casting).    Blockchain Innovation Conference On the 7th of June the 5th edition of the Blockchain Innovation Conference takes place in the headquarters of the Rabobank in Utrecht. It is the biggest conference on blockchain innovation of the Benelux (Belgium-Netherlands-Luxembourg). This year 500+ participants will be present, representing more than 100 companies. Known and inspiring speakers will be present, like Prince Constatijn, Wiebe Draijer (CEO Rabobank), Frans Kempen (Blockchain Lead IBM) and Janko Gorter (Nederlandse Bank).  Do you also want to drop by and meet the Mijn Vastgoed™ team? There are still tickets available. Ordering can be done here. More information about the conference can be found at this website.

Author: Arrrvin
Title: [ANN][ICO] Mijn Vastgoed Dutch real estate
Body: The Token Sale is Live  After a long wait the time arrived. The Token Sale is Live. Investing is very easy, quick and is possible from 250 EUR onwards. Payments can be made through a bank transaction in EUR (48 hours) or with ETH (45 minutes). Become now dividend holder of this revolutionairy concept and make investments in real estate possible for everyone!  - Team Mijn Vastgoed™  Participate Now

Author: cryptoenthus
Title: [ANN][ICO] Mijn Vastgoed Dutch real estate
Body: Congrats on that ICOHolder listing! This may seem like a dumb question, but do you allow non-Dutch people to invest in your project? I think the fact that you focus "only on Dutch market" may discourage some potential investors.
